hasDitaContent.@value: Vandetanib is predicted to increase the risk of bleeding events when given with acenocoumarol. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both vandetanib and amifampridine prolong the QT interval. Most manufacturers advise avoiding the use of two or more drugs that are associated with QT prolongation. Increasing age, female sex, cardiac disease, and some metabolic disturbances (notably hypokalaemia) predispose to QT prolongation.
